pkgmetadata.longdescription: Conduct a Prospective or Retrospective Design Analysis // An implementation of the "Design Analysis" proposed by Gelman and Carlin (2014) doi:10.1177/1745691614551642. It combines the evaluation of Power-Analysis with other inferential-risks as Type-M error (i.e. Magnitude) and Type-S error (i.e. Sign). See also Alto et al. (2020) doi:10.3389/fpsyg.2019.02893 and Bertoldo et al. (2020) doi:10.31234/osf.io/q9f86.
